knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

### 1. Build Height Vector
```{r}
new_vector_1 <- c(30.7, 37.6, 28.4, NA, 33.2)
```

### 2. Build Mass Vector
```{r}
new_vector_2 <- c(4, 5.2, 3.7, NA, 4.6)
```

### 3. Build Data Matrix
```{r}
box_office <- c(new_vector_1, new_vector_2)
box_office
```

```{r}
plant_matrix <- matrix(box_office, nrow = 2, byrow = T)
plant_matrix
```

```{r}
measurements <- c("height", "mass")
measurements
```

```{r}
titles <- c("plant_1", "plant_2", "plant_3", "plant_4", "plant_5")
titles
```

###. 4. Name Columns and Rows
```{r}
rownames(plant_matrix) <- measurements
```

```{r}
colnames(plant_matrix) <- titles
```

```{r}
plant_matrix
```

### 5. Calculate Meand of Each Column
```{r}
plant_means <- rowMeans(plant_matrix, na.rm=T)
plant_means
```

### 6. Add this to New Row 
```{r}
plant_matrix_final <- cbind(plant_matrix, plant_means)
plant_matrix_final
```
